channel.title: Help: how to start playing
channel.description:
ok, I downloaded moparscape
i see many servers for download and there many files zipped and stuff i also heard about hamachi??
can someone please explain what i should do to play?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 11, 2007, 06:10:26 PM[/size][hr]cmon people, i know it takes effort to explain. but please, thats the only way i could play

item.title: Help: how to start playing
item.dc:creator: @NojTB NojTB
item.description:
@NojTB wrote:

creating a server isint somethign i can just explain, im just starting to create myown, but there should be a bunch of tuts on it in the tut forum.

Read full topic

item.title: Help: how to start playing
item.dc:creator: @Miff_Nyc Miff Nyc
item.description:
@Miff_Nyc wrote:

can you tell me how to create a server?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 11, 2007, 06:20:09 PM[/size][hr]many of the servers i try to log in to dont work

Read full topic

item.title: Help: how to start playing
item.dc:creator: @NojTB NojTB
item.description:
@NojTB wrote:

ya can rither joing a game or make a server, id suggest joinning games when ya first start out.
and all ya have to do is click file new ip and new port after you find one in server addvertisments.

Read full topic
